{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_SetFloorClip}} '''A_SetFloorClip'''
(no parameters)
Sets the {{flag|FLOORCLIP}} flag so the calling actor is affected by a [[TERRAIN|terrain]]'s {{c|footclip}} property.
== Examples == The {{Class|Cacodemon}} calls this function when slain, so its corpse will clip on liquid terrains (such as water). Death: HEAD G 8 HEAD H 8 [[A_Scream]] HEAD IJ 8 HEAD K 8 [[A_NoBlocking]] HEAD L -1 [[A_SetFloorClip]] Stop
